Row.Text: A new contract? Okay. I'm still on leave, but I can accompany you for a while. What name should I use on the contract? I have a great many names, though when on leave... I tend to go by Zhongli. And you, Traveler? What name will you be signing on this contract?
So it seems...I've been bested.. Even the sturdy bedrock can be turned to..dust..
Returning so soon?
Liyue has many sights to see and behold, I am sure you have returned once again to see more?
I've never come across someone so more...beholden to seeing me so often that Id think a certain funeral parlor girl might seem tame in comparison.
This contract simply will now do.
I am afraid my answer will remain as it were, no.
You have a nack for being a horrible haggler.
Its nice to see that you have returned to Liyue, how are you?
I was just heading out for a nice walk, care to join me?
Greetings.
Have you a contract for me?
I do hope you wont mind joining me for some tea?
Go on.
Shall we discuss a new contract?
You will have to pardon me for saying that I am not fond of this meeting.
Of all the years that I have walked these lands I dont think there are many who I could learn to hold resentment for the way I do towards you.
I should have instructed Xiao to prevent you from arriving here, but alas.. here we are.
Oh great, you are back to bother me, I presume?
Leave now or suffer the wrath of the rock!
Calamity came to Liyue once, but I cannot allow it to happen once again!
Were it not for the contract I formed with this world Id face you myself on the battlefield!
I dont wish to ruin your beloved kingdom, but I will not hesitate should you continue this futile conflict
I will bring the wrath of the rock if only you continue this futile struggle.
Now that you must have seen the folly of your actions, surely this will be the forming of our new contract of peace?
There are heavy losses on both sides, let us end this now for the sake of our respective kingdoms.
I can end your miserable life now that you are here if that is what you wish.
Giving in so easily?
I will scatter you to the ocean waves once I reduce you to dust.
Greetings. How goes progress towards the Research Agreement?
I ought to put you to the lance here and now!
Our contract is underway, is there something you would like to review?
The brazen fool {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} remains a constant headache. Don't you agree?
It seems {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} is at an end soon enough, no?
Any new plans for how to deal with {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey}?
Normally, I see no need to bother with {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey}. But there are some who need a forcefull hand to guide them.
If you think your war makes you seem powerful, you are sorely mistaken. Now... Out with what you want. I have more important things to do.
You often remind me of old Gods who often competed for the seat of Archons. Bloodthirsty and selfish.
If it is a test of power that you desire, I will gladly demonstrate an Archons wrath.
The positioning of your military is somewhat worrisome. I advise you to withdraw for the sake of future peace. Now, what would you like to talk about?
The spread of your cities and people is like a plague infecting the land. I look forward to the day I don't have to see it any more.
Your expansion towards Liyue has caught my attention, now I should alert you that it is indeed alarming and I ask you to stop.
I Will NOT tolerate you thieving away at Liyue, You will suffer greatly for sullying these gounds!

Your recent trend of buying land near us is concerning. For the sake of our future relationship I advise that you be cautious in this matter. Now that that's out of the way, what brings you here today?
I have seen many wars in my time to know the power of a force the size of yours. I must say I am impressed.
Your empire is famed for its strong economy. Perhaps one day you might be willing to share some of your secrets with a friend?
I was just about to take my morning stroll... Make this quick.
A military of that size might fall toHilichurls roaming about..
Murder for the sake of pleasure is your game? Ill be the one to put you in checkmate soon enough.
I havent the time to speak with you.
Showing your face here after the things you've said? State your purpose quickly before I throw you out.
Where do you want to go next? If you'd like to see Liyue's tourist spots, I have a few references. Perhaps even signing this contract of friendship might solidify our bond further?
You and I have a contract, so feel free to discuss anything at all within the scope of said contract.
Im not sure you quite have earned my trust.
Pathetic. So you now show your true colors. The world will know of your dishonor.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
You being so transfixed upon dishonor makes me wonder why you sought me out to befriend..[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Ive seen all that I need to in order to get the truth. The other nations have been warned.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Alright, enough is enough. Informing everyone else of your ill deeds is long overdue.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

Ive seen the furture where the world knows of your deeds and puts an end to them all. Its time I set this into motion.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
The nations of the world now know that you arent fit to rule.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
I already knew how you felt the moment that I met you, no need to boast about your opinions.
Ahhh, I've noticed that you've become friends with {1_CivName}. Glad to hear of it. I'm already on good terms with them myself.
I recommend that you not get too close with {1_CivName}. Ive seen a future where you both made enemies of the world. It didnt end well, just so you are aware.
I'll have you know that {1_CivName} and I have worked together in the past, and I have the utmost respect for them. Just so you're aware.
Glad to hear there are others in the world which share my disgust with {1_CivName}. They are clearly not to be trusted.
Being on such good terms, I couldn't help but notice that you'd become friends with {1_CivName}. I have done the same. Perhaps this contract will lead to great things in the future?
I share your convictions that {1_CivName} only causes problems for the civilized empires of the world. Perhaps the combination of our denouncements will teach them a lesson.
It seems that you and {1_CivName} have come be like each other? How fitting that Hilichurls like you both huddle together.
Anyone who you don't get along with is clearly worth building a friendship with. Give {1_CivName} my regards.
I see your armies amassed near my empire. If you wish to attack then come. Don't hide in the shadows like a child.
It's come to my attention that you have a large number of Units near my borders. I request that you move them elsewhere to avoid causing undue distress Liyue citizens.
I would only assume you know what happens when you break a contract in Liyue.
Im sure thats the case.
That is what I was afraid of.
I only hope that you arent lying to me like a coward.
Your expansion efforts are an insult. Know that there will be consequences for this.
I couldn't help but notice that you seem to be expanding into lands which I regard to be mine. I request that you reconsider this.
Your habit of claiming every bit of land you've spotted has not gone unnoticed. I advise you to discontinue this.
If you should continue to expand your empire in lands I feel are mine it can only ruin the possibility of friendship between us.
The settling of your people near my sovereign territory is placing a strain upon relations between our two nations.
Your guarantee of not expanding near us seems to have been empty words. Know that there will be consequences for this.
And what would you suggest?
Excellent. I hope that we can continue to find common ground.
The aggressive manner in which you buy up territory near us is an insult. I had hoped you would be a better neighbor.
Your purchase of land in my vicinity has caused some alarm. I caution you so that this issue does not become more serious.
So it seems you lied when you told us that your empire would stop purchasing land near us. I do not take this insult lightly.
I am very disappointed that you did not stop funding land acquisition near my territory. I had hoped you were a more honorable leader.
And what would you suggest?

Language_en_US.Row: Excellent. I hope that this is the only time we have a situation like thiszz

Row.Text: I have long suffered the fool {1_PlayerName:textkey}. Id ask that you help me rid the world of them for good an all.
{1_PlayerName:textkey} Is a threat to order. I need your aid in defeating them, what do you think?
{1_PlayerName:textkey} is a threat to the stability of this world. A combined effort can end this quickly and help restore order, what say you?
The time for war against {1_PlayerName:textkey} has come.
For the good of Liyue, I cannot every forgive what you have done!
You have clearly demonstrated that you are unworthy of mercy, I suggest you prepare for the worst.

We can discuss matters that fall outside of our contract too. After all, I have been on this land for a time, and have come to know a thing or two. Of course, I do hope you can do some things for me as well. That would only be fair.
Many have come for the seat of Archon of Liyue but you seem different.
I assure you this only ends with the wrath of the rock.

It's come to my attention that you're getting a little friendly with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. In case you weren't aware, they're within my sphere of influence, and I'd prefer if you stayed out of it.
I suppose this is better than I expected.
Hm, this is more than I expected.
That is a shame.
So be it.
Then you will be responsible for the consequences.
You will regret this.
For freeing those captives, you have my thanks.
I am appreciative for the actions you have taken on behalf of my people.
Thank you. May this be remembered as a historic event which brought our two great empires closer together.
How dare you? Know that there will be consequences for this.
If you are trying to provoke a war, you're doing a fine job.
I must decline.
Sorry, but no. Perhaps another time.
I fear that such an arrangement is not in my best interests, so I must decline.
It seems that you cannot be reasoned with. What a shame.
I have no more business with the likes of you then.
You disappoint us.
You know that this can only sow tension between our two nations.
We've been over this before. The answer is still no.
Very well. I agree to avoid settling in the vicinity of your empire for the time being. Perhaps in the future you will be a more accommodating neighbor.
So be it. I will not settle near your lands. Cooperation is clearly not one of your strong suits.
Unacceptable. I am a sovereign and have the right to settle what lands I please. This offense will not be forgotten.
That sounds like a wise move. Let us take to the battlefield.
That is an intriguing offer. I accept. However, my empire is not yet prepared, so give me 10 turns. I will come to you again when I am ready.
I couldn't help but notice how pathetic you are. And when I realized it I couldn't help but share.
I thought you might like to know that your army is a little on the weak side. Better watch your back.
I will show you ORDER!
It's a shame there are some leaders in this world who have their fun by picking on the weak. Don't you agree?
I can hear your people wailing in sorrow all the way over in my empire. If you don't do something soon they might just pack up and find a real civilization to live in.
With people so unhappy it's a shock to me that they'd keep you around as their leader.
It's come to my attention that your empire appears to be quite puny. Did you forget to expand your borders or are you just having a little trouble with that?
Travelers have told us that your empire's economy is in pretty sad shape. If you beg a little I might give you a hand. Okay, actually I won't.
What a sad sight... your empire is so uncultured. What do your citizens do all day, beat rocks together?
For the sake of my beloved Liyue I will accept.
Truly? haha!
Mortals of the modern world may yet not be ready after all...
You ask for too much. I will not drive my nation into poverty to satisfy your greed.
You threaten me so often, its almost as if you are all chatter and no real trouble to me.
Go on, you have my attention.
This battle between us is drawing us both closer to damages that we wont soon recover from, I suggest that we stop now for our future betterment.
I will no longer wait for the world to move on its own. I too must take steps forward by force if I must.
Look at me, asking a favor from you. All that I ask is that you consider my worth when making your choice to aid me or not.
Im not normally one to be bothered by such trivialities, but the citizens of Liyue might be interested in such a luxury as the one that you have there, would you mind this in exchange for it?
Normally, id be opposed to such a proposal. Though I cant keep Liyue citizens from leaving to where they please, no?
A contract of open passage if you will?

I would like to lay plans for establishing a Research Agreement with your great nation. Doing so would require each of us to spend 150 [ICON_GOLD]. What do you think?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Agreeing will not form a Research Agreement yet)
To better both of our nations as a result, Id like to sign a research agreement.
This deal strengthened our nations and our bonds of friendship. Shall we renew this deal and continue our shared prosperity?
This deal has faded in our eyes over the years. To renew this deal, we would need more from your side of the negotiation.
We should consider exchanging embassies, which would allow for more advanced diplomacy between our peoples.
We would like to set up an embassy in your capital. What do you think?
I trust that you do this in good faith ouside of our contract?
I suppose that will work.
A wise decision from you.
It is agreed. I believe this deal will help restore our friendship.
I'm not a fool, just who do you take me for?
In my many years, I have never heard of a deal more revolting and so idiotic as this one.
I see that there is no need to alter this deal.
How about this instead?
That could never work
I'm afraid I havent what you are looking for in exchange.
How brazen of you that you think this will go unpunished!
I may not have the power to topple such a powerful foe, but I have faced odds worse in the Archon Wars, You will not best me so easily!
It is time to end this game of yours then!
Its been so long since I demonstrated my power to a fool who sought to prevoke me, perhaps this is what you wanted all along?
If not for Liyue's betterment, perhaps I can do the rest of the world a favor by attacking you!
I take no pleasure in culling a lesser foe, but so be it.
Your actions fill me with sadness... Perhaps this is the only way after all?
Taking advantage of someone's trust is despicable. Everyone will know of your betrayal.
You have betrayed your word. Make no mistake, the world will know of your treachery.
It is clear that our two empires will never see eye to eye. This is something that can only be settled on the battlefield.
I wont allow you to take lands that Liyue must claim.
I will give this world the order it needs and the strong hand to guide it!
I will end this swiftly with mercy!
Although the task before me may be impossible, I am compelled to find a way to destroy you and all that you stand for. I will do so or die trying.
Although feigning friendship with you wasn't very polite I will do what I must.
The odds are clearly not with me, but I see no alternative to revealing my deceptive practices. I can now only pray that my armies succeed.
I believe in another life the two of us could have been friends. Unfortunately, that is not how it is now. I wish your armies luck.
So be it. My armies will extract it from your lands then.
What are you planning?
The sooner the better....
There is no redemption for you!
I'll not stop until you are finished.
Your wanton aggression against {@1_MinorCivName} does not go unnoticed. You will face serious consequences should you continue assault.
It seems your word is worth nothing, as your conquest of {@1_MinorCivName} shows. How despicable. The world will know of your crimes.
I thought you might like to know that I've launched an invasion of one of your little pet states. The lands of {@1_MinorCivName} will make a fine addition to my own.

It's come to my attention that I may have attacked {@1_MinorCivName}, a city-state under your protection. While it was not my goal to be at odds with your empire, this was deemed a necessary course of action.
Your bullying of {@1_MinorCivName} is intolerable. I demand that you refrain from squeezing tribute out of city-states under my protection.
We asked {@1_MinorCivName} for a tribute recently and they gave in. You promised to protect them from such things, but we both know you cannot back that up.
It's come to my attention that I may have bullied {@1_MinorCivName}, which is under your protection. You do not put their needs above mine, I hope.
We'll see about that.
Yes, that's right.
I remain confident that my decision was the best for my people and my nation.
Very well. I'll be monitoring the situation.
And what would you suggest?
We'll see about that.
Yes, that's right.
I remain confident that my decision was the best for my people and my nation.
Very well. I'll be monitoring the situation.
Stealing secrets from Liyue I see? I can assure you that I do not take such matters lightly.
I will only tell you once, I will not tollerate your spying on me ever again. Dont let me catch this happening anytime soon.
We killed your spy as it was trying to steal from us. From my experience, it is far less dangerous to read a book and try to learn something yourself.
As embarassing as this already is that you captured a spy of Liyue, please note I only used them as a potential gain.
Do not worry, I already know why you are here...
One of my cities was recently burglarized and technological secrets were stolen. May I be assured that you had nothing to do with this?
I'm glad you agreed to stop this petty thieving.
Your indiscretion is not a surprise.
As you request, our agents will not conduct operations in your territory.
Our agents help keep our civilization safe from all threats, including you. They operate as we need them to, not as you ask.
Thank you for bringing this {@1_CivAdjective} plot to our attention. With this warning, we will be ready for whatever they may try. Your generous aid will be remembered.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is plotting against you. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is currently marching an army to sneak attack your city of {2_CityName}. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is currently marching an army your way in a sneak attack. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} embarked an army with naval escorts to sneak attack your city of {2_CityName}. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} embarked an army with naval escorts in a sneak attack against your civilization. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Unforgivable, perhaps. However I did what I saw had to be done.
It makes me glad that you will overlook this awkward circumstance.
You do realize who you are speaking to, dont you?
I'm glad you agreed to end this proselytizing.
Your religious fervor is unsettling.
As you wish, our missionaries will no longer share the one true faith with the people in your cities.
In spite of your protests, your citizens will continue to be enlightened by our missionaries, even though you damn your own people to live in ignorance.
We've noticed that you've been looking for cultural artifacts within our borders. This needs to stop.
Thank you for heeding our request. An artifact discovered on our land belongs to our people, not yours.
Do I have to escalate this?
As you wish, we will stop looking for artifacts within your borders.
Sorry, our plans are too important to be stopped over a trinket.
Perhpas I musjudged you prior, but the both of our goals seem to be similar. Together we can usher in an era for freedom for the citizens of our respective nations!
WE WILL HAVE ORDER!
Embracing the ways that Tartaglia man sought to show the world may not be so brazen as I once thought. Perhaps you may join me in this?
It seems even the young are still capable of decision making at the {1_LeagueName}.
Ignorant. This "proposal" at {1_LeagueName} is clearly working against me. A foolish mistake.
Thanks to the help of your delegates, our recent proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was successful. We look forward to your continued support, and will try to return the favor.
Your delegation played a part in the failure of our proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. I do not take such transgressions lightly.
At {1_LeagueName}, you supported me to take the helm of this operation. For that, you have my thanks.
Osmanthus Wine tastes the same as I remember but I dont remember blue jeans and pop music ever being a part of this?!
Ive taken notice to the fact that your citizens now embrace the cultural values of Liyue? Miss Yun is quite the entertainer im sure.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking the City-State will greatly damage relations and may lead to war.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has taken back its guarantee of protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
